issues.description: The problem statement specifies that `orders` should be a `List<Meal>`, but both the templateâ€™s helper methods (ArrayHelpers) and the solution implementation use a `Meal[]` array for `orders`. This mismatch between the described data structure (List) and the provided/used data structure (array) can confuse students about which collection type to use.
issues.suggested_fix: Either update the problem description and UML to refer to a `Meal[]` array (to match the ArrayHelpers approach), or adjust the template/solution to use `List<Meal>` consistently (with appropriate imports and List operations).
